name: Iron Mountain
description:
This is a derpy little game I made for the BowersIndustry Christmas Jam. I ended up not having time to add any sounds or music, but I might add them in the future, and maybe expand the game so that it reaches its natural conclusion. 

Controls:

 Z- A Button

X- B Button 

Arrows keys for movement

The 1-bit GB Studio Logo was made by Filipe. 

Thanks for playing!
